page.description: Available functions and methods for the Table objects.

item.name: [RECORD_DELETE Function]
item.description: Deletes one or more record(s) in a table that match the filter condition

item.name: [ENTER_RECORD Method]
item.description: Allows for data to be entered when using xbasic with a Form or Browse. Returns a dot variable that is the validation object.

item.name: [CHANGE_RECORD Method]
item.description: Allows for data to be changed via xbasic, when using a Form or Browse. Returns a dot variable that is the validation object.

item.name: [DELETE_RECORD Method]
item.description: Allows for data to be deleted via xbasic, when using a Form or Browse. Returns a dot variable that is the validation object.
